name: Way of the Ascendant Dragon
description: Monks of the Way of the Ascendant Dragon channel draconic power to enhance their martial prowess and achieve a spiritual unity with the Material Plane. They emulate dragons to gain extraordinary abilities, from breathing destructive energy to soaring through the air on spectral wings.

ascendant_dragon_origin.description: You decide how you unlocked the power of dragons through your ki. Possible origins include observing a dragon, being shaped by a dragon, studying at a dragon-influenced monastery, meditating in a dragon’s lair, finding a scroll in Draconic, or having a prophetic dream involving a dragonborn.

benefits.name: Draconic Presence
benefits.description: If you fail a Charisma (Intimidation) or Charisma (Persuasion) check, you can use your reaction to reroll the check. Once this feature turns a failure into a success, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest.

benefits.name: Draconic Strike
benefits.description: When you damage a target with an unarmed strike, you can change the damage type to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.

benefits.name: Tongue of Dragons
benefits.description: You learn to speak, read, and write Draconic or one other language of your choice.

breath_of_the_dragon.description: You can channel draconic energy in a 20-foot cone or a 30-foot line (5 feet wide). Choose a damage type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison). Creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw against your ki save DC, taking damage equal to two rolls of your Martial Arts die on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. At 11th level, the damage increases to three rolls of your Martial Arts die. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining uses after a long rest. You can spend 2 ki points to use it again if no uses are left.

wings_unfurled.description: When you use Step of the Wind, you can unfurl spectral draconic wings granting you a flying speed equal to your walking speed for the turn. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining uses after a long rest.

benefits.name: Frightful Presence
benefits.description: As a bonus action, you create an aura of draconic power for 1 minute. You can choose a creature within the aura to make a Wisdom saving throw against your ki save DC or become frightened of you for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turns.

benefits.name: Resistance
benefits.description: Choose a damage type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison) when activating this aura. You and your allies within the aura gain resistance to that damage type.

aspect_of_the_wyrm.description: You can create an aura of draconic power that radiates 10 feet from you. You can’t create this aura again until you finish a long rest unless you expend 3 ki points.

benefits.name: Augment Breath
benefits.description: You can spend 1 ki point to increase the shape and power of your Breath of the Dragon. The exhalation becomes either a 60-foot cone or a 90-foot line (5 feet wide). Creatures in the area take damage equal to four rolls of your Martial Arts die on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

benefits.name: Blindsight
benefits.description: You gain blindsight out to 10 feet. Within this range, you can see anything that isn’t behind total cover, even if you’re blinded or in darkness.

benefits.name: Explosive Fury
benefits.description: When you activate Aspect of the Wyrm, draconic fury explodes from you. Choose any number of creatures within your aura; each must make a Dexterity saving throw against your ki save DC or take 3d10 damage of the chosen type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison).
